scene.line: I'm the grrrtst fighter on this island
Steve the pirate sent me to find you
He said you had his map
I suppose I did have it
Mebbe I'll remumber where it is if I can get some more gin!
I think you've probably had enough...
Can you just tell me where it is?
It's my birthday and I have plans
I can't be wandering around sorting out everyone's lives for them all day
I got some Vodka here somewhere...
Maybe I could just get the map instead?
And I didn't want to lose it
I wrote down where I hid it
And kept it safe in my wallet
So shall we look in your wallet?
That big bastrd. I dunno his name
'Salright. I can take him in a fight
You can come cheer me on. Whaddya say?
I can take the big bastrd in a fight
'N get the map back for ya
You can come cheer me on. Whaddya say?
Do you know what his name is?
But I think you can scratch that from his name
Cos I'll take the big bastrd in a fight
'N get the map back for ya
You can come cheer me on. Whaddya say?
That'll lead you to the map...
You want a piece of me?
I think I'm close to getting a bite...
Do you know where I could find some walking boots?
I want to get over the mountains
But I can't really do that in these shoes
I think I'm close to getting a bite...
Do you know where I could find some walking boots?
I want to get over the mountains
But I can't really do that in these shoes
I think I'm close to getting a bite...
I think I'm close to getting a bite...
Could I borrow your rod in the mean time?
So it's got to come soon
When you say the water is coming
No. I mean I'm sure a river or a lake
Will turn up here sooner or later
Cedric came and sat on my head
And I took it as a sign
Whoever heard of an aquaphobic duck?
It's only a matter of time
You know there are loads of lakes on this island, right?
Lots of them are really nice
I'm sure Cedric would love them...
Maybe you could sell the idea to me a bit...
If I said I was looking for
scenic alpine lake where cantilevered boardwalks jut out of the rockface
How about if I was looking for
backed by the glistening peaks of the Southern Alps?
Have you heard of any lakes
that cover the remains of a gold mining town
grassy reserve-backed soft gravel beach with wonderful mountain views
Or maybe it's a has lake that has shrunk as the forest has encroached
What I'm actually after is a brackish lagoon
How about if I was looking for
backed by the glistening peaks of the Southern Alps?
Have you heard of any lakes
that cover the remains of a gold mining town
grassy reserve-backed soft gravel beach with wonderful mountain views
Or maybe it's a has lake that has shrunk as the forest has encroached
What I'm actually after is a brackish lagoon
I think I'll stay here for now
I might just give up on fishing
Me and Cedric can go bungee jumping instead
Here, you can have my rod
Hey. Do you want to race?
I'm the best runner on the island!
But you don't know where I could get some decent shoes do you?
I want to cross the mountains
And I don't think I can do that in these...
Sure. I've got a spare pair around somewhere
No wait, you cut me off
If you can beat me in a race
Just don't look at my chest while I run
Think you can take me this time?
Think you can take me this time?
Think you can take me this time?
Think you can take me this time?
I never thought you'd beat me
But I guess a deal's a deal
You can find the shoes here...
I thought you were wanting to go hiking over the mountains?
Yeah. I guess I should get on that
Are you sure you're here to see me?
I was trying to say: 'Are you Dina?'
People always think I'm only going to say 'Aaarrrrr'
That's a nice ship you've got
The wizard told me you might be able to take me to the other island...?
I'd love to take you to the other island
Great. How much does it cost?
Don't be silly - I'm a pirate!
I offset the expenses of my free ferrying business
By pirating in the local area!
I'm not sure about the ethics of that
I only pirate from Trump supporters
I lent my map to Frank
And he hasn't given it back
I can't walk all the way over there
If you could pick it up I'll take you to the other island
Just go find Frank and get the map back...
Have you got my map yet?
Are you sure you need it?
I've only got the one good eye
Neither of my eyes are particularly good
So I guess that's fair enough...
Have you got my map yet?
If he's the fella I'm thinking of
Then he used to serve on my ship
When he was a littler bastard
And when I ran a postal ship
I remember he wanted nothing to do with a couple of postal codes
I think the other was Lerwick
Do you have the map yet?
I just have to decipher Frank's scribblings!
Can we go to the other island now?
Which you can use to find my emergency supply kit
You never know when it might come in handy
It's the great outdoors down here
Yeah. I think I'll go do a bit of exploring
I don't suppose you know where I could get some decent outdoor shoes?
I would've had some in my youth
But I'm not so active any more
Your best bet is probably to see if you can find any runners
When I was in the running club
We used to hang out at the south end of the island
I don't suppose you know where I could get some decent outdoor shoes?
I would've had some in my youth
But I'm not so active any more
Your best bet is probably to see if you can find any runners
When I was in the running club
We used to hang out at the south end of the island
I just wanted to get some new shoes
But then I had to get into this whole race thing
Ah, you'll be fine. Just train a bit
I didn't want to race anyone today
And I just wanted to sit around eating chocolate
But instead I'm having to train drunks
You don't happen to know her name do you?
She was a young talent in the running scene when I was in my prime
I knew that I couldn't stay on top forever
But the way that she shamed me when she beat me for the first time
You've just got yourself a personal trainer
I'm going to help you beat her
Anything to put her back in her place
So how do we do this?
First you need to tell me
What's the most important thing in the world to you?
Here's what you've got to do
You need to get some chocolate
Tie the chocolate to the stick with the string
And put the stick down your back
Chocolate, dangling right in front of you
If only you could get to it
I guess I just need to find a stick and some string...
I'm still trying to get hold of a stick and some string
I'm still trying to get hold of a stick and some string
But I've got hold of a stick and some string!
I'll go gloat at her in a bit
I'll go gloat at her in a bit
I hope you enjoy your birthday here!
How do you know my name?
I know your name because I'm a wizard
I thought that might be obvious from my clothing
I even put on my formal hat
Because he's drunk a lot of the time these days
I don't know where I've put your card
When did I last have it...?
I think I've left it on the other island
Normally I'd send some eagles to go get it
But my eagles are at a spa retreat weekend
So I think you might need to go get it yourself
Steve the pirate might be able to help you get there
He has a ship. It's a bit further to the south...
It's ok. It's the thought that counts
Do you know how much effort it was to get Frank to sign it?
Alright then. I guess I'll go on a birthday quest
Did you meet Steve the pirate yet?
You can probably find him on his ship
Did you meet Steve the pirate yet?
So you went to the other island and found the card!?
Did you just come here for a chat then?
So I'm guessing you don't have your card yet?
I need Frank to get his wallet back from 'The Big Bastard'
But Frank can't see straight at the moment
So he doesn't have much of a chance
Oh. That must be... I forget his name
You might be able to help Frank out
The big fellow's a simple chap
If you can shout out his name
And Frank could sneak his wallet back...
I think it's got 5 letters in it
And it's got something to do with Dirty Dancing
The main actor. That's a good place to start
Steve and Frank might remember more fully
Can you remember the Big Bastard's name yet?
It's got something to do with Dirty Dancing
The main actor. That's a good place to start
Steve and Frank might remember more fullly
It looks like you have a map!
